name: Overall Performance
query: SELECT participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(r.overall_score.score, 1) AS "Score", r.evaluation_metadata.num_tasks AS "Tasks", r.evaluation_metadata.num_successful AS "Passed" FROM (SELECT participants, results[1] AS r FROM results) ORDER BY r.overall_score.score DESC

name: Section Breakdown
query: SELECT participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(r.section_scores.knowledge_retrieval.score, 1) AS "Knowledge", ROUND(r.section_scores.analytical_reasoning.score, 1) AS "Analysis", ROUND(r.section_scores.options_trading.score, 1) AS "Options", ROUND(r.section_scores.crypto_trading.score, 1) AS "Crypto" FROM (SELECT participants, results[1] AS r FROM results) ORDER BY r.overall_score.score DESC

name: Crypto Trading Details
query: SELECT participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(r.section_scores.crypto_trading.score, 1) AS "Crypto Score", ROUND(r.section_scores.crypto_trading.sub_scores.sharpe, 2) AS "Sharpe", ROUND(r.section_scores.crypto_trading.sub_scores.total_return, 2) AS "Return%", ROUND(r.section_scores.crypto_trading.sub_scores.max_drawdown, 2) AS "MaxDD%" FROM (SELECT participants, results[1] AS r FROM results) WHERE r.section_scores.crypto_trading IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.section_scores.crypto_trading.score DESC
